Text:

oh it was correct, ignore above comment.
Why is your torrent only 471 bytes? Windows 8 is about 3 GB. This must be fake
Nevermind, I see what you did. But I can't prove that it works.
This doesn't truly remove the watermark, you are just hiding it. By the way, you have a misleading title.
sorry about the title, yes it only hides it, but I think its good enough until somebody release a crack to remove it.
@crybaby95 if you read the title, it removes watermarks idiot!

not bad but i just figured out better way. it hiddes it completely. OPEN PERSONALIZE - GO TO DESKTOP BACKGROUND - CHOOSE FIT - SELECT BACKGROUND COLOR TO WHITE - SWITCH BACK TO FILL. WATERMARK WILL APPEAR EVERY TIME YOU CHANGE THEME. REPEAT THIS STEPS FOR EVERY THEME YOU WANT TO USE. WIN 8 CP X64 proly works for x32 also
